0.Pros: Fast paced environment, lots of room for growth, promotes from within, great co-workers. Great opportunity for high school and early college kids.
0.Cons: Got called in to cover shifts a lot as a shift lead. Management was not good. Promoted, but pay did not increase with promotion.

1.Pros: The crew I worked with made things run smoothly.
1.Cons: Customers were rude at the Gallery location, and while the crew was great, there was a lot of rotating of good members in and out which killed the pros.

2.Summary: "I've worked there for over a year"

3.Pros: I keeps a bag under the counter to put mistakes in so I can eat at the end of my shift.
3.Cons: The man. My so called manager sits over my shoulder and complains about my drawer when it doesn't add up. I be like look lady if you want in my drawers then lets go out back to my truck and we can do this like adults.

4.Cons: drama! with highschoolers and managment, favoritism, and managers arent trained well, no communication

5.Pros: Great Benefits for employees long term
5.Cons: Workload must be reviewed for operations, less administration

6.Pros: Friendly coworkers, flexible schedules, easy training
6.Cons: Low pay, fast pace environment, dirty

7.Pros: fast paced environment, lots of food
7.Cons: Too much food in front of you

8.Pros: Had hours non stop. Made good friends.Had fun while working.I'm very good with fast paced working.

9.Cons: The restaurant that worked in did not have a great manager. Schedules were mad two days before the week started. It doesn't boost employee morale to threaten people with being fired if they don't work on holidays.
